mail.subject: Approved invoice buy mobuyonline.com No. ${input.code}
mail.content:
Dear ${input.billingInformation.firstName} ${input.billingInformation.lastName}
Thank you for using mobuyonline.com

Your order has been reviewed in our panel and has been approved.
A mail will be sent to you once the order is ready to be delivered.

${html}
Kind regards,
Sales team
ArchNet ltd
